archimate:Grouping.name: SOGP Adversarial Threat Events
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
This grouping shows threat events from the Threat Event Catalogue in the Standard Of Good Practice.
It presents the threat events that could be initiated by the threats within the adversarial threat group (e.g. competitor, hacking group and organised criminal group). This group includes threats that perform one or more deliberate actions against an organisationâ€™s information or systems, with the intention of causing harm.
